basics.name: Tony Letian Tang
basics.summary: Undergraduate Student at Carnegie Mellon University. Short biography for the left-hand sidebar

publications.name: More-efficient Quantum Multivariate Mean Value Estimator from Generalized Grover Operator
publications.summary: By combining existing ideas with novel techniques, I constructed the fastest multivariate mean value estimation. algorithm. For d dimension and $$d$$ success probability, the algorithm runs in only log(d/d))/log(1/d)) slower than the known lower bound.

publications.name: Quantum Dueling: an Efficient Solution for Combinatorial Optimization
publications.summary: An independent project where I discovered an efficient optimization algorithm based on the Grover operator. I recruited five fellow undergrads and trained them to start work. We demonstrated a strong performance of the algorithm via numerical simulations and justifications for its success.
